name: Alcmene
symbol: Aegis, helmet, spear, armor, Gorgoneion, chariot, distaff
parent: Electryon and Anaxo (daughter of Alcaeus)|Anaxo/ Lysidice (mythology)|Lysidice/ Eurydice of Mycenae|Eurydice or Amphiaraus and Eriphyle
children: In Greek mythology, 'Alcmene' ({{IPAc-en|æ|l|k|ˈ|m|iː|n|iː}}) or 'Alcmena' ({{IPAc-en|æ|l|k|ˈ|m|iː|n|ə}}; Ancient Greek: Ἀλκμήνη or Doric Greek: Ἀλκμάνα, Latin: Alcumena means "strong in wrath"
